name: Cherry
description: A cherry is a fruit that grows on a tree or a bush. It belongs to the genus Prunus. It is red in color, with a seed in the middle.

name: Tomato
description: omatoes are rich in lycopene, an antioxidant that is good for the heart and effective against certain cancers.

name: Mango
description: Mangos are also rich in vitamin C, which is important for forming blood vessels and healthy collagen, as well as helping you heal

name: Rep Mango
description: Mangos are also rich in vitamin C, which is important for forming blood vessels and healthy collagen, as well as helping you heal

name: Rambutan
description: Rambutans are also full of potassium, a mineral that helps your heart beat, kidneys function, and muscles contract.

name: Green Apple
description: Green apples are rich in Vitamin C, Vitamin A, antioxidants, and phytonutrients, which make them a great food for improved vision.

name: Grapes
description: rapes are a good source of potassium, a mineral that helps balance fluids in your body

name: Capsicum
description: Because they are not fully mature, they have a bitter after taste, and half the vitamin C and 1/10th the vitamin A compared to their red or orange siblings

name: Orange
description: Oranges are rich in antioxidants that work to eliminate free radicals, keeping skin healthy and free of cancer.

name: Lemon
description: Lemons are high in vitamin C, fiber, and various beneficial plant compounds. These nutrients are responsible for several health benefits.

name: Strawberry
description: These potent little packages protect your heart, increase HDL (good) cholesterol, lower your blood pressure, and guard against cancer.

name: Banana
description: Bananas are a tasty and convenient source of some important nutrients. People have grown this tropical fruit since ancient times, and its health benefits have been promoted for more than a century.
